displayName.text: Morris Cleaners | Dry Cleaners | Tailor | Alterations

formattedAddress: 435 East 86th St, New York, NY 10028, USA

authorAttributions.displayName: Morris Cleaners | Dry Cleaners | Tailor | Alterations

adrFormatAddress: 435 East 86th St, New York, NY 10028, USA

originalText.text:
I needed a new place as mine closed so after some research, I tried them. The staff is lovely and friendly but unfortunately the service is not good. I had to return 2 blazers to be redone as the stains were not removed at all. And that keeps happening. Stains remain when I take the garments out of the bags. Also one of the blazers was so poorly iron that I will need to get it redone somewhere else.
The 3 starts are exclusively for the staff, NOT the service

originalText.text:
We started using them a few months ago and our experience with Morris Cleaners has been nothing short of amazing. The attention to detail and commitment to quality is evident in every aspect of their service.

The customer service is exceptional as well. They are very prompt in their service, and I appreciated their clear communication throughout the process.

They are a true gem in the realm of dry cleaning. Their commitment to excellence, attention to detail, and outstanding customer service sets them apart. I highly recommend Morris Cleaners to anyone in need of professional and reliable dry cleaning + wash & fold services.

originalText.text:
Morris Cleaners is hands down the best dry cleaning service I have come into contact with ever.
I was moving back to New York and shipped a luggage that encountered water damage leading to 30 items of my clothes being covered in mold upon its time to unpack. Josh kindly and patiently let me explain the situation, and then urgently encouraged me to send him the items (despite a snow storm) so he and his team could immediately go to work on them. After receiving the items, the outlook was bleak, but despite the damage Josh and his team completely revitalized the 30 items in less than a week!
I am so appreciative and thankful for his custom service, kindness and hard work! Without his help I would have lost thousands of dollars in clothing. Thank you Josh and team! Truly I will only send my most prized clothing to you from now on (did I mention I live on the lower west side, completely out of the way, but totally worth it!) Below are images of some of the clothes before and after, I am still in shock and completely in trust of this company after this experience. Thank you again!

originalText.text: Took my wedding dress to be taken in there and they did an outstanding job!

text.text: Took my wedding dress to be taken in there and they did an outstanding job!

originalText.text:
Started supporting them during the midst of COVID as they said had they lower customer volume from WFH. Very good service then, delivery included and efficient cleaning. Not sure if maybe their business returned/got better and started getting arrogant. Their signs at the door are also outdated and very unclear, a combination of opening hours(with stickers saying hours might change but no indication of when?), mask requirements, etc. Yesterday I came in at 6:52pm looking to drop off some dry cleaning and alterations and the door was already locked, lady inside didn’t bother to do or say anything and proceeds to turn the light off. The door sign said open hours 10-7pm. Don’t say you close at 7pm if you’re going to close at 6:50pm or earlier. For some this might be the only time they can drop off dry cleaning, have some professionalism and inform your customers.

Edit: the “clerk” in the back saw me then proceeded to turn the lights off anyway, despite seeing me not being able to open the door, I tried knocking as well, but of course, the owners probs will never disclose or admit to that. It was a very disappointing moment and truly unfortunate.
